snippet: Mohammed Magarief, the leader of the National Front party, was chosen as president on Thursday in a vote carried out a day after the body took power from the Transitional National Council.
abstract: Libya's interim national assembly chooses Mohammed Magarief, leader of the National Front party, as its president.
lead_paragraph: Mohammed Magarief, the leader of the National Front party, was chosen as president on Thursday in a vote carried out a day after the body took power from the Transitional National Council.
